amendment.description: To provide that the Secretary of the Army shall not be considered an owner or operator for purposes of environmental liability in connection with the construction of an portion of the Fairfax County Parkway of the Engineer Proving Ground, Fort Belvoir, Virginia, that is not owned by the Federal Government.

action.text: Amendment SA 4509 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Jeffords.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4509 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
